CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: When the PzNDTDTBO blend film was then thermally annealed at 150 °C for 10 min , R a is further increased.

Let's think step by step.

In the given paragraph, the following are the "Material Name" entities:

1. PzNDTDTBO - This is a material name, as it is a combination of several chemical elements (P, Z, N, D, T, D, and B) and is a unique identifier for this specific material.
2. blend film - This is also a material name, as it refers to a specific type of material composed of multiple components.

Therefore, the two material names in the paragraph are:

1. PzNDTDTBO
2. blend film
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

Sure, here are the material names mentioned in the paragraph:

1. PzNDTDTBO

The other entities in the paragraph are not material names, so I have removed them:

Relevant entities:

1. PzNDTDTBO

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Certainly! Here are the valid material names mentioned in the paragraph:

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PzNDTDTBO |

I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any further questions.

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: When the PzNDTDTBO blend film was then thermally annealed at 150 °C for 10 min , R a is further increased.

Let's think step by step.

In the given paragraph, the following are the "Property Name" entities:

1. PzNDTDTBO - This is a chemical compound or material, which is the subject of the experiment.
2. R a - This is a physical property, specifically the "areal density" of the PzNDTDTBO blend film, which is increased due to thermal annealing at 150 °C for 10 minutes.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Property.

Sure, here are the entities in the paragraph that refer to material properties:

1. PzNDTDTBO - This is a chemical compound or material, which is the subject of the experiment.
2. R a - This is a physical property, specifically the "areal density" of the PzNDTDTBO blend film.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Certainly! Here are the valid entities in the paragraph that refer to material properties, presented in a Markdown table with one column "Property Name":

| Property Name |
| --- |
| PzNDTDTBO |
| R a |

I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any further questions.

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: When the PzNDTDTBO blend film was then thermally annealed at 150 °C for 10 min , R a is further increased.

Let's think step by step.

In the given paragraph, the following entities can be identified as "Property Value" entities:

1. R a: This is the property value of the thermal annealing-induced increase in the crystallinity of the PzNDTDTBO blend film.
2. 150 °C: This is the temperature at which the thermal annealing was performed.
3. 10 min: This is the time duration of the thermal annealing process.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.

Sure! Here are the entities that refer to the value of material properties in the given paragraph:

1. R a: This is the property value of the thermal annealing-induced increase in the crystallinity of the PzNDTDTBO blend film.

So, the only entity that refers to a material property value in the paragraph is "R a".

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Certainly! Here are the valid entities in the paragraph that refer to material property values, presented in a Markdown table:

| Property Value |
| --- |
| R a |

The entity "R a" refers to the thermal annealing-induced increase in the crystallinity of the PzNDTDTBO blend film.
